featured.text: Future plans include a cooperative effort among many nations to stop littering in space and to clean up the trash already there.

Since that rainy morning in Mill Valley, the World Café approach has been applied to multi-group discussions and cooperative actions by businesses, industries, and educational institutions around the world.
The Icelandic success is accomplished largely through cooperative efforts across various industries.

definition.en_def: Involving mutual assistance in working toward a common goal.
definition.example: The cooperative team worked together to complete the project on time.
